subject: Google Ads Account Update: Complimentary Support For Simsonn
description_text:
Dear Advertiser,

I hope you're doing well. This is Bianca, Senior Account Manager from
Google New Business Onboarding Team.

If you're not familiar yet, Google offers *complimentary* onboarding
support to our *new and highest-potential advertisers*, making you eligible
for this assistance *at no additional cost.*

*I have already conducted a preliminary review of your Google Ads setup. I
noticed specific settings and missing optimizations are currently limiting
your ad performance, which needs to be discussed as soon as possible.*

Please let me know if you have any availability this week, I would love to
schedule a quick introductory call to review your account and ensure your
setup is healthy and performing at its best. Alternatively, you can book a
time that suits you below.

Schedule a time

If you prefer, you can simply reply with your *Google Ads Customer ID and
the Email Address* associated with your account, I'll send you the account
insights directly via email.

I look forward to hearing from you!


*Best,Bianca*
--
*Important: If you have an urgent concern and I am not responsive, please
reach out to:*

   - *Immediate Supervisor:*  Maria Christina Hernandez |
   hernandezmc@xwf.google.com
   - *Support:* Maria Kristina Caparal | caparal@xwf.google.com
   <pvillamor@xwf.google.com>
   - *Secondary Contact: *Christine | machristinemae@xwf.google.com

*Thanks and regards,*

•  Bianca Mharyl

*•  Account Strategist•  Supporting Google Ads Onboarding*

*•  Email: biancamharyld@xwf.google.com <biancamharyld@xwf.google.com>*
